response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its true value to be well above $10,000. Considering its exceptional quality and potential impact on your business, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $15,000. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you're interested in discussing further details or have any questions, please let me know.", "product_price": 15000}
